name: SCP game
description:
You play as a researcher named Sal who's tasked with gathering missing research lost by a coworker. You get to wander the facility to try and find it. 

Features:
+ Multiple SCPS and deaths
+ Kill some D-Class by your own idiocy
+ A closet that would protect you from a bomb.
+ COLOR! WONDEROUS COLOR!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • A: Alt, z, j
  • B: control, k, x
  • Start: Enter

Hints for people having trouble:
+ If you gather all the research you can find go talk to the boss. He should have a keycard for you. You need 7 in order to get the keycard.
+ If you have issues with the mask try not looking directly at them or rapid smash the A button.
+ If you have issues with the shy guy just won't walk up there.
+  If you have issues with 106 just find a closet. he'll really only catch you by cutting corners. This may change later.
+ Dodging 682 is easier then it looks. wait for him to swing, disappear and then BOOK IT.

This is a very small game I made to test the logistics and feasibility for GB Studio 2.0. I may come back to it from time to time to update it or add new things.
I'd like to add new music but I am decidedly not a composer so for now it'll just have music from my other game.
